questions.question: Azure AI Document Intelligence can analyze both structured and unstructured data from documents.
Custom models in Azure AI Document Intelligence require extensive coding skills to train and deploy.
Microsoft AI principles are optional when using Azure AI Document Intelligence for sensitive data.
Which feature is NOT supported by Azure AI Document Intelligence?
What is a common use case for Azure AI Document Intelligence?
Describe the advantages of integrating Azure Logic Apps with Azure AI Document Intelligence for enterprise workflows.
questions.answer: Integration with Azure Logic Apps enhances automation by enabling workflows such as invoice processing and email notifications, streamlining business operations.

questions.question: What are the best practices to ensure ethical and secure usage of Azure AI Document Intelligence?
questions.answer: Best practices include incorporating human-in-the-loop oversight, respecting data privacy laws, maintaining security protocols to prevent unauthorized access, and aligning with Microsoft's Responsible AI principles.
